cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-5802

description: Buffer overflow in QT Media Foundation in Apple OS X before 10.9.5 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted MIDI file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-4350

description: Address Book in Apple iOS before 8 relies on the hardware UID for its encryption key, which makes it easier for physically proximate attackers to obtain sensitive information by obtaining this UID.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-4352

description: Race condition in iMessage in Apple iOS before 8 allows attackers to obtain sensitive information by leveraging the presence of an attachment after the deletion of its parent (1) iMessage or (2) MMS.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-4353

description: Apple iOS before 8 enables Bluetooth during all upgrade actions, which makes it easier for remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions via a Bluetooth session.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-4354

description: Apple iOS before 8 does not follow the intended configuration setting for text-message preview on the lock screen, which allows physically proximate attackers to obtain sensitive information by reading this screen.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-4356

description: Accounts Framework in Apple iOS before 8 and Apple TV before 7 allows attackers to obtain sensitive information by reading log data that was not intended to be present in a log.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-4357

description: The Home & Lock Screen subsystem in Apple iOS before 8 does not properly restrict the private API for app prominence, which allows attackers to determine the frontmost app by leveraging access to a crafted background app.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-4361

description: The Sandbox Profiles implementation in Apple iOS before 8 does not properly restrict the third-party app sandbox profile, which allows attackers to obtain sensitive Apple ID information via a crafted app.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-4362

description: Safari in Apple iOS before 8 does not properly restrict the autofilling of passwords in forms, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via (1) an http web site, (2) an https web site with an unacceptable X.509 certificate, or (3) an IFRAME element.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-4363

     *cpe:2.3:a:apple:safari:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:* versions up to (including) 7.0.5

description: The 802.1X subsystem in Apple iOS before 8 and Apple TV before 7 does not require strong authentication methods, which allows remote attackers to calculate credentials by offering LEAP authentication from a crafted Wi-Fi AP and then performing a cryptographic attack against the MS-CHAPv1 hash.

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in IBM Integration Bus Manufacturing Pack 1.x before 1.0.0.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

description: SQL injection vulnerability in IBM Security QRadar SIEM 7.2 before 7.2.3 Patch 1 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2014-4824

description: IBM Security QRadar SIEM 7.2 before 7.2.3 Patch 1 does not properly handle SSH connections, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive cleartext information by sniffing the network.

description: IBM Storwize 3500, 3700, 5000, and 7000 devices and SAN Volume Controller 6.x and 7.x before 7.2.0.8 allow remote attackers to reset the administrator superuser password to its default value via a direct request to the administrative IP address.
